item.title: Risk of Euro Falling to Parity Versus Dollar Has Abated for Now
item.description: The euro was weaker against the dollar, but the risk of it falling below parity with the dollar in the first quarter of the year has fallen, according...

item.title: Stock Futures Higher as Dollar Whipsaws on Trump Tariff Plans
item.description: Stock futures stood modestly higher coming out of the long weekend.

item.title: Gold Futures Slip as Trump Decides Against Immediate Tariffs

item.title: Oil Majors Flirt With Electricity
item.description: As power generators such as Vistra soar, oil-and-gas giants are dipping their toes into a business where they have some natural advantages.
